verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> I commend <S%G4921><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> Phebe <S%G5402><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sister, <S%G79><s%> which is <S%G5607><s%> a servant <S%G1249><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is at <S%G1722><s%> Cenchrea: <S%G2747><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye receive <S%G4327><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> as becometh <S%G516><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that ye assist <S%G3936><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> business <S%G4229><s%> she hath need <S%G5535><s%> of you: <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> she <S%G3778><s%> hath <S%G2532><s%> been <S%G1096><s%> a succorer <S%G4368><s%> of many, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1700><s%> myself <S%G848><s%> also.
Greet <S%G782><s%> Priscilla <S%G4252><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> helpers <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> have for <S%G5228><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> laid down <S%G5294><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> necks: <S%G5137><s%> unto whom <S%G3739><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> give thanks, <S%G2168><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

Likewise <S%G2532><s%> greet the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> that is in <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G848><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> well-beloved <S%G27><s%> Epaenetus, <S%G1866><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the firstfruits <S%G536><s%> of Achaia <S%G882><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> bestowed much labor <S%G2872><s%> <S%G4183><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Andronicus <S%G408><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Junia, <S%G2458><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kinsmen, <S%G4773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow prisoners, <S%G4869><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> of note <S%G1978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Amplias <S%G291><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Urbane, <S%G3773><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> helper <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Stachys <S%G4720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved. <S%G27><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Apelles <S%G559><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> which are of <S%G1537><s%> Aristobulus' <S%G711><s%> household.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Herodion <S%G2267><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kinsman. <S%G4773><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that be of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> household of Narcissus, <S%G3488><s%> which are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Tryphena <S%G5170><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Tryphosa, <S%G5173><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Persis, <S%G4069><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G2872><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Rufus <S%G4504><s%> chosen <S%G1588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mine. <S%G1700><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Asyncritus, <S%G799><s%> Phlegon, <S%G5393><s%> Hermas, <S%G2057><s%> Patrobas, <S%G3969><s%> Hermes, <S%G2060><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> which are with <S%G4862><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Philologus, <S%G5378><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Julia, <S%G2456><s%> Nereus, <S%G3517><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> sister, <S%G79><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Olympas, <S%G3652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> which are with <S%G4862><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> mark <S%G4648><s%> them which cause <S%G4160><s%> divisions <S%G1370><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> offenses <S%G4625><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have learned; <S%G3129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> avoid <S%G1578><s%> <S%G575><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they that are such <S%G5108><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> but <S%G235><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> belly; <S%G2836><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> good words <S%G5542><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fair speeches <S%G2129><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> simple. <S%G172><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> is come abroad <S%G864><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. I am glad <S%G5463><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> on your behalf: <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5213><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> yet I would <S%G2309><s%> have you <S%G5209><s%> wise <S%G1511><s%> <S%G4680><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> that which is good, <S%G18><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> simple <S%G185><s%> concerning <S%G1519><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> shall bruise <S%G4937><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> your <S%G2257><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> shortly. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Timothy <S%G5095><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> workfellow, <S%G4904><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Lucius, <S%G3066><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jason, <S%G2394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sosipater, <S%G4989><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kinsmen, <S%G4773><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
I <S%G1473><s%> Tertius, <S%G5060><s%> who wrote <S%G1125><s%> this epistle, <S%G1992><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Gaius <S%G1050><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> host, <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> Erastus <S%G2037><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chamberlain <S%G3623><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Quartus <S%G2890><s%> a brother. <S%G80><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that is of power <S%G1410><s%> to establish <S%G4741><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the revelation <S%G602><s%> of the mystery, <S%G3466><s%> which was kept secret <S%G4601><s%> since the world began, <S%G5550><s%> <S%G166><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is made manifest, <S%G5319><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4397><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> made known <S%G1107><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith: <S%G4102><s%>

To God <S%G2316><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> wise, <S%G4680><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
